skill.name: human-docs
skill.description: Creates human-friendly documentation from AI context documentation. Transforms detailed AI documentation in ai/ folder into digestible summaries, quick starts, and visual diagrams in docs/ folder. Use when users need to quickly understand complex systems or when AI documentation is too detailed for human consumption. Specializes in Mermaid diagrams, executive summaries, and quick reference guides.
skill.summary: Creates human-friendly documentation from AI context documentation. Transforms detailed AI documenta...
skill.author: Brownbull

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based documentation transformation skill with no executable code, no network access, and no file system operations beyond reading and writing markdown documentation files.

content.user_title: Transform AI documentation into human-friendly guides
content.value_statement: Complex AI documentation is difficult for humans to process quickly. This skill extracts essential information and creates three accessible formats: executive summaries, step-by-step quick starts, and visual Mermaid diagrams that make technical concepts easy to understand.
actual_capabilities: Creates executive summaries from detailed AI documentation
Generates step-by-step quick start guides with code examples
Produces Mermaid.js visual diagrams including flowcharts and sequence diagrams
Maintains parallel folder structure between ai/ and docs/ folders
Supports batch processing of entire documentation folders
Updates existing human docs when source AI documentation changes
limitations: Only transforms existing documentation, does not create new documentation from scratch
Does not execute code or perform technical validation
Does not support real-time collaboration or multi-user workflows

use_cases.title: Onboard developers quickly
use_cases.description: Generate summaries and diagrams from technical specs so new team members understand architecture without reading thousands of lines of documentation.

use_cases.title: Create executive reports
use_cases.description: Transform detailed technical documentation into one-page executive summaries with visual diagrams that communicate system architecture to stakeholders.

use_cases.title: Build visual documentation
use_cases.description: Extract and enhance existing documentation with Mermaid diagrams, flowcharts, and architecture visuals for improved readability.

prompt_templates.title: Create all formats
prompt_templates.prompt: Create human docs for ai/architect/app/01_CORE_DATA_PIPELINE.md including summary, quick start, and diagrams

prompt_templates.title: Generate summary only
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a summary for ai/business/use_cases/CUSTOMER_SEGMENTATION.md focusing on business value and key insights

prompt_templates.title: Create visual diagrams
prompt_templates.prompt: Create Mermaid diagrams for ai/architect/app/07_WORKFLOWS_AND_DATA_FLOW.md showing data flow and component interaction

prompt_templates.title: Batch process folder
prompt_templates.prompt: Create summaries for all documents in ai/architect/app/ and generate a docs/README.md index file

output: Created docs/architect/app/02_BACKEND_REQUIREMENTS_SUMMARY.md - 2-page executive overview with key decisions and quick reference table
Created docs/architect/app/02_BACKEND_REQUIREMENTS_QUICKSTART.md - 5-minute guide with 5 implementation steps and verification commands
Created docs/architect/app/02_BACKEND_REQUIREMENTS_DIAGRAMS.md - 4 Mermaid diagrams showing API flow, database schema, and state transitions

best_practices: Always keep ai/ folder as the source of truth and only modify docs/ through this skill to maintain consistency
Use the parallel folder structure naming convention (FILE_SUMMARY.md, FILE_QUICKSTART.md, FILE_DIAGRAMS.md) for easy navigation
Generate diagrams for complex architectural concepts but keep diagrams simple with maximum 7-10 nodes per diagram
anti_patterns: Manually editing docs/ without updating ai/ first breaks the source of truth relationship
Creating human docs before AI documentation exists defeats the purpose of the skill
Using overly complex Mermaid diagrams with more than 10 nodes reduces readability

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. All are supported equally since this is a prompt-based documentation skill.

faq.question: Can I use this with any documentation format?
faq.answer: Designed for markdown documentation in ai/ folder. Works best with structured documents that have clear sections and headings.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my original AI documentation?
faq.answer: No. This skill only reads from ai/ folder and creates new files in docs/ folder. Original documentation remains unchanged.

faq.question: How do I update human docs when AI documentation changes?
faq.answer: Invoke the skill with the UPDATE_EXISTING workflow and provide the path to the updated AI documentation.

faq.question: Can I create only diagrams without summaries or quick starts?
faq.answer: Yes. Use the DIAGRAMS_ONLY workflow to generate just visual diagrams from any documentation file.

faq.question: How is this different from other documentation skills?
faq.answer: This skill transforms existing AI documentation into human formats rather than creating new documentation from scratch.
